closed.title: International latency & packet loss
closed.description: Our carrier is experiencing a transoceanic fibre cut that is causing increased latency and packet loss to some international destinations. We are working with our provider to resolve the intermittent connection as soon as possible. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
